name: 伊莱·索恩
introduction: Eli Thorne is a British born stage and screen actor based in Utrecht, NL.Eli worked for a number of years in the south-west of England, quickly rising to lead roles in major regional theatres. After developing as both an actor and theatre-maker, Eli moved to the Netherlands where he added voiceover to his skills, including Isaac in "Deliver Us The Moon".Eli also began a film career in the Netherlands, appearing in a number of shorts, including Dominic Linane's "Mesmerism" and the award-winning "Lights Out" from Director Wesley Versteeg. As a debut feature, Eli also starred in TCF's "Vigilante", appearing at Cannes Film Festival 2013.
